Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $619.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:41:50 UTC – Details)

Product Description

MINISFORUM Mini PC UM580

AMD Ryzen 7 5800H, 8 Cores/16 ThreadsAMD Radeon Graphics (Graphics Frequency 2000 MHz)DDR4 8GB ×2 Dual channelM.2 2280 512GB PCIe SSD1×2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot (SATA 3.0 6.0Gb/s)M.2 2230 WIFI Support

Dual HDMI & 2 x USB-C Video Outputs

Upgraded friendly

UM580 mini computer comes with M.2 2280 512GB PCle SSD.UM580 uses DDR4, dual SODIMM memory technology, which significantly improves the transmission speed and efficiency, reduces power consumption compared to DDR3. It comes with Dual channel and support maximum expansion to 64GB RAM.It’s expandable with the addition of up to 2 TB of 2.5-inch SSD or HDD[NOT INCLUDED].

Display ALT-Mode

One of the USB-C port on the back of the computer supports ALT-Mode. Alt-Mode allows USB-C ports to transfer video via multiple interfaces, including the increasingly popular DisplayPort video interface.

Data

DisplayPort and USB interfaces share connectors. This feature opens up more possibilities for DisplayPort applications. For example, mobile phones can easily connect to peripherals such as mice, keyboards, and screens, just like a computer host in your pocket.

USB Power Delivery

If the monitor support USB PD (USB Power Delivery), users can use this port to power the computer and transfer video signal to the monitor at the same time which makes the whole setup cleaner.

Portable Mini PC

Mini PCs are not only mini-sized, but also powerful and space-saving. The wall mount bracket easily attaches to the back of the monitor. You can take it with you when you are traveling, meeting or speaking. Bring convenience to your life.

Multiple Application Options

Great choice for multiple commercial and industrial network activities, like Server, POS, Monitor, TV, Printer, Projector.Very nice idea as a gift for Children, Parent and friends.

Package

1 * MINISFORUM UM5801 * Power Adapter1 * HDMI Cable (60cm)1 * Mounting Bracket1 * User Manual1 * Computer Stand

GaN Power Supply

Minisforum UM580 mini pc is the world’s first mini PC that comes with GaN power supply which is safer, faster and more portable.

One for All: The 60W charger can auto detect the devices and compatible with mainstream charging protocols that can charge for a series of notebooks, for iPhones and Android phones, tablets and more.Perfect for Business Travel: Thanks to GaN tech, the 65W / 100W power adapter is more than 60% smaller than traditional silicone chargers, less bulky to be carried in your pocket.Fast Speed Charging: The USB-C GaN charger delivers up to 93% conversion rate, much higher efficiency than a standard charger.

The Questions and Answers of the UM580 mini pc

Does UM580 come with Windows OS preinstalled?

The UM580 mini pc pre-installs Windows 11 Pro system. If you need any help, please con tact us.

How many monitors does UM580 support?

UM580 can connect with 4 monitors at the same time. HDMI(4K@60Hz) * 2/USB-C Port(4K@60Hz) * 2.

What kind of SSD does UM580 support?

1×2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot (SATA 3.0 6.0Gb/s)

M.2 2280 PCIe SSD (Replace the original one)

Customers who purchase products from Jack’shop store will enjoy the VIP customer treatment at first timing.

【High Performance】 Powered with AMD Ryzen 7 5800H processor. 8 Cores/16 Threads, base clock 3.2 GHz, up to 4.4 GHz. Pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro. UM580 can combine your work and life for efficiency.
【Large Capacity】 Installed dual channel DDR4 16 GB RAM (2 x 8 GB) and can be upgraded to 64 GB. Beside, installed 512 GB M.2 PCIe SSD and can expand the storage via a 2.5 inch SATA HDD slot for your personal needs.
【Dual HDMI+Alt-Mode USB-C】 UM580 mini computer designed with Dual HDMI ports and Dual USB-C (①Display , 4K@60Hz , In Front; ②Alt-Mode , 4K@60Hz , In Back), which allows you to multitasking by connecting to 4 monitors.If the monitor support USB PD (USB Power Delivery), users can use Alt-Mode USB-C port to power the computer and transfer video signal to the monitor at the same time.
【GaN Power Supply】UM580 mini pc is the world’s first mini PC that comes with GaN power supply which is safer, faster and more portable.The USB-C GaN charger delivers up to 93% conversion rate, much higher efficiency than a standard charger. It can be applied to a variety of electronic devices, small and exquisite.
【Strong Connectivity】1 * RJ45 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet Port, 2 * USB 2.0 Port, 2 * USB 3.2 Port(Gen2), 1 * USB-C, 1 * USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C, 1 * USB 3.2 Type-C, 1 * Clear CMOS, 1 * DMIC, 1 * Power Button. Enough to connect different devices to meet different application scenarios. Lifetime technical support and 7/24 customer service. Feel free to message us if you have any questions.
Lifetime technical support & 2 years warrant y & One-to-one customer service.

  • M.2 2280 512GB PCIe SSD

Minisforum UM580 mini pc is the world’s first mini PC that comes with GaN power supply which is safer, faster and more portable.

  1. One for All: The 60W charger can auto detect the devices and compatible with mainstream charging protocols that can charge for a series of notebooks, for iPhones and Android phones, tablets and more.
  2. Perfect for Business Travel: Thanks to GaN tech, the 65W / 100W power adapter is more than 60% smaller than traditional silicone chargers, less bulky to be carried in your pocket.

Price: $669.90 - $535.92
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:35:53 UTC – Details)

Product Description

CPU AMD Ryzen 7 5800H, 8 Cores/16 Threads GPU AMD Radeon Graphics (Graphics Frequency 2000 MHz) Memory DDR4 16GB ×2 Dual channel (SODIMM Slots ×2) Storage M.2 2280 512GB PCIe SSD Storage Expansion 1×2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot (SATA 3.0 6.0Gb/s) Wireless Connectivity M.2 2230 WIFI Support (Wi-Fi，BlueTooth) Video Output 2x HDMI (4K@60Hz) , 2x USB Type-C(4K@60Hz) Audio Output HDMI , 3.5mm Audio Jack Power 100W GaN Type-C Power Delivery adapter(Included)

Alt-Mode USB-C

USB Power Delivery

If you monitor supports USB PD, use this port to power the computer and transfer video signal to the monitor at the same time which makes the whole setup cleaner.

Data Transmission

One of the USB-C port on the back of the computer supports ALT-Mode. Alt-Mode allows USB-C ports to transfer video via multiple interfaces, including the increasingly popular DisplayPort video interface.

Video Output

The Alt-Mode allows USB-C ports to transfer video via multiple interfaces, including the increasingly popular DisplayPort video interface.

GaN Power Supply

UM580 comes with GaN power supply which is safer, faster and more portable.

One for All: The 100W charger can auto-detect the devices and is compatible with mainstream charging protocols, allowing it to charge a series of notebooks, iPhones, Android phones, tablets, and other devices.Perfect for Business Travel: Thanks to GaN tech, the 100W power adapter is more than 60% smaller than traditional silicone chargers, making it less bulky to carry in your suitcase.Fast Speed Charging: The USB-C GaN charger delivers up to 93% conversion rate, much higher efficiency than a standard charger.

CPU
AMD Ryzen 7 5800H AMD Ryzen 5 5625U AMD Ryzen 5 3550H AMD Ryzen 7 3750H Ryzen 7 4800U

GPU
AMD Radeon Graphics (Graphics Frequency 2000 MHz) AMD Radeon Graphics (Graphics Frequency 1800 MHz) Radeon Vega 8 Graphics (Graphics Frequency 1200 MHz) Radeon RX Vega 10 Graphics (Graphics Frequency 1400 MHz) AMD Radeon Graphics (Graphics Frequency 1750 MHz)

RAM
16/32GB 8/16GB 16GB 16GB 16/32GB

SSD
512GB 256/512GB 256/512GB 512GB 512GB

Expand Storage
1×2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot 1×2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot 1×2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot 1×2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot 2×2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot

Ethernet
2500Mbps 2500Mbps 1000Mbps 25000Mbps 1000Mpbs; 2500Mbps

【Powerful Performance】： The MINISFORUM UM580 Mini PC is a small form factor Desktop Tower Computer with an AMD Ryzen 7 5800H (8C/16T up to 4.4Ghz) processor. The faster performance can handle heavy computing tasks smoothly and better for multitasking. It widely used for light games, image editing, browsing, watching movies, programming etc.
【Equipped with GaN Power Supply and Support ALT-Mode】: The MINISFORUM UM580 comes with GaN Power Supply, which is safer, faster and more portable. One USB-C port on the back of computer supports ALT-Mode. It allows USB-C port to transfer data/video via multiple interfaces. If your monitor supports USB Power Delivery, you could use this port to power the computer and transfer video signal to the monitor at the same time.
【Quad Screen 4K@60Hz Display】: this Mini PC comes with Integrated Radeon Graphics(graphics frequency 1800 MHz), 4K@60Hz four display outputs via two HDMI Ports, and two USB-C Ports, you could connect four independent displays, which ensures smooth navigation, responsive work processes and comfortable handling of apps and files and expands multiple work-spaces for more efficient and comfortable productivity.
【2.5Gbps LAN】: This MINISFORUM UM560 Mini Computer comes with 2500Mbps Lan Port, it expands its functions and improved performance of computer to a large extent and allow you to use more networks such as software routers (OpenWRT / DD-WRT / Tomato etc.), firewalls, NAT, network isolation etc.
【Large Capacity】: DDR4 32GB RAM (2x SODIMM slot, each of slot can be upgraded to 32GB) + 512GB 2280 NVMe SSD(up to 2TB) pre-installed. One 2.5 inch SATA HDD slot can up to 2TB. Without worrying about lack of capacity, you can run software smoothly, watch and storage large-scale movies, photos without any stress. You can also enjoy some games to some extent.
【Package Contents】：1x MINISFORUM UM580 Mini PC, 1x HDMI cable, 1x Mounting Bracket, 1x Power Adapter, 1x US manual.
